org.openimaj.util.hash.composition

Class HashComposition<OBJECT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.util.hash.composition.HashComposition<OBJECT>
  • Type Parameters:
    OBJECT - Type of object being hashed
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    HashFunction<OBJECT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PolyHashComposition, RandomProjectionHashComposition, SimpleComposition

    public abstract class HashComposition<OBJECT>
extends Object
implements HashFunction<OBJECT>
    HashCompositions are HashFunctions that compose the hash codes generated by multiple hash functions applied to an object into a single hash code for that object.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • HashComposition

        public HashComposition(HashFunctionFactory<OBJECT> factory,
                       int nFuncs)
        Construct with the factory which is used to produce the required number of functions.
        Parameters:
        factory - the factory to use to produce the underlying hash functions.
        nFuncs - the number of functions to create for the composition
